amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 116-320 to clarify "relating to the market", adds an explicit personal benefit test, and strikes the Rule of Construction.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 116-320 to clarify "relating to the market", adds an explicit personal benefit test, and strikes the Rule of Construction.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McHenry amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. McHenry.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McHenry amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
